attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what our president had to say, and it’s absolutely nothing. Total garbage. This app kept crashing and sending me alerts 24/7 riddled with propaganda and hate. Worst of all apps, the absolute worst.
attributes.title: Worst app out there, the worst of all apps
